subject: Re: [junit] Failing multiple times in one test
msgSnippet: ... Well, I m not all that bad: the code was using HashMaps. L -- Laurent Duperval  Voisin, vous seriez une vraie lumière...
messageBody:
On 3 Sep, Mike Clark wrote:
> Both are Maps, but the notable differences are that HashMap methods are
> unsynchronized and nulls are allowed; Hashtable methods are synchronized
> and nulls are not allowed.
>

Well, I'm not all that bad: the code was using HashMaps.

L

--
Laurent Duperval <mailto:lduperval@...>

Voisin, vous seriez une vraie lumière... si on avait ouvert l'interrupteur.
-Lefuneste
